channel.title: Biometric Encryption on The Encryption Compendium
channel.description: Recent content in Biometric Encryption on The Encryption Compendium

item.title: Encryption, Biometrics, and the Status Quo Ante
item.description: Authors: Rosenzweig, Paul Published: July 2015 URL: https://www.lawfareblog.com/encryption-biometrics-and-status-quo-ante Abstract: As the recent indirect debate between FBI Director James Comey and co-blogger Susan Landau makes clear, the underlying premises of the encryption issue are highly contested. The Senate will continue the debate this week with a hearing before the Judiciary Committee on July 8 at which our own Herb Lin (among others) will testify and another hearing before the Intelligence Committee.
